description: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing, Ningguang is a Geo catalyst user who excels at single-target damage and provides powerful shields with her Jade Screen.
info: Ningguang is a Geo DPS who excels at single-target damage and provides utility with her Jade Screen. Build her for CRIT, ATK%, and Geo DMG Bonus.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Sparkling Scatter
skills.desc: Shoots gems that deal Geo DMG. Upon hit, grants Ningguang a Star Jade. Charged Attack: Consumes stamina to fire off a giant gem, dealing Geo DMG. If Star Jades are present, they are fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional Geo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Shoots gems that deal Geo DMG. Grants a Star Jade on hit.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to fire a giant gem. If Star Jades are present, they are fired as well, dealing additional Geo DMG.
Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of gems in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE Geo DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Jade Screen
skills.desc: Ningguang creates a Jade Screen that blocks projectiles and deals AoE Geo DMG. The screen's HP scales with Ningguang's Max HP.
skills.details_html:
Jade Screen
Creates a Jade Screen that blocks projectiles and deals AoE Geo DMG. HP scales with Max HP.

skills.name: Starshatter
skills.desc: Gathering a great number of gems, Ningguang scatters them all at once, sending homing projectiles at her enemies that deal massive Geo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Starshatter
Scatters gems that home in on enemies, dealing massive Geo DMG.

passive_talents.name: Backup Plan
passive_talents.desc: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume stamina.

passive_talents.name: Strategic Reserve
passive_talents.desc: A character that passes through the Jade Screen gains a 12% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Trove of Marvelous Treasures
passive_talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby ore veins used in forging on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Piercing Fragments
constellations.desc: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

constellations.name: Shock Effect
constellations.desc: Jade Screen grants 10% Elemental RES to all nearby characters.

constellations.name: Majesty be the Array of Stars
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Starshatter by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
constellations.desc: Jade Screen regenerates 10% of Ningguang's Max HP when destroyed.

constellations.name: Invincible be the Jade Screen
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Jade Screen by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Grandeur be the Seven Stars
constellations.desc: When Starshatter is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.
